categories.name: General Tours
categories.desc: This section consists of four general tours that go around campus!

tours.name: Freshman Residence Halls
tours.desc: Hey! This is a tour of the freshman residence halls!

landmarks.name: RPI Admissions
landmarks.description: This is the admissions building.

landmarks.name: Barton Residence Hall
landmarks.description: Barton was first opened in Fall 2000 and in addition to being our newest residence hall, it also has the distinction of being the campus' only freshman only residence hall.

landmarks.name: Commons Dining Hall
landmarks.description: Situated at the center of the first-year residence halls, the Commons offers several dining stations. These include the popular Asian Pacifica, a savory grill program, pasta prepared to order, a deli and Theme Cuisine.

landmarks.name: Mueller Center
landmarks.description: The Mueller Center is the hub of personal fitness and wellness on the Rensselaer Campus.

landmarks.name: Biotech
landmarks.description: The Center for Biotechnology and Interdisciplinary Studies (CBIS) at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute interweaves life sciences, physical sciences, and engineering into the fields of biotechnology and medicine, opening exciting new pathways to innovation and discovery.

landmarks.name: EMPAC
landmarks.description: The Curtis R. Priem Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute is where the arts, sciences, and technology interact with and influence each other by using the same facilities and technologies, and by breathing the same air.

landmarks.name: Folsom Library
landmarks.description: The mission of the Rensselaer Libraries is to support Rensselaer’s educational and research endeavors.

landmarks.name: Sage Laboratory
landmarks.description: Russell Sage Laboratory houses a writing center, multimedia computer labs, and video production and sound editing equipment.

landmarks.name: 87 Gym
landmarks.description: The ’87 Gymnasium (gift of the class of 1887) has a swimming pool, two small gymnasia, an indoor track, and racquetball and squash courts.

landmarks.name: Quad
landmarks.description: The Quadrangle, or The Quad for short, was one of the first residence halls on campus and recently renovated in the 1980s.

landmarks.name: Student Union
landmarks.description: Rensselaer Union has been driving campus engagement and student activities at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) since 1890.

landmarks.name: RPI Admissions
landmarks.description: This is the admissions building.

landmarks.description: The mission of the Rensselaer Libraries is to support Rensselaer’s educational and research endeavors.

landmarks.name: Sage Laboratory
landmarks.description: Russell Sage Laboratory houses a writing center, multimedia computer labs, and video production and sound editing equipment.

landmarks.name: 87 Gym
landmarks.description: The ’87 Gymnasium (gift of the class of 1887) has a swimming pool, two small gymnasia, an indoor track, and racquetball and squash courts.

landmarks.name: Quad
landmarks.description: The Quadrangle, or The Quad for short, was one of the first residence halls on campus and recently renovated in the 1980s.

landmarks.name: Student Union
landmarks.description: Rensselaer Union has been driving campus engagement and student activities at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) since 1890.

landmarks.name: RPI Admissions
landmarks.description: This is the admissions building.

tours.name: Walker Tour
tours.desc: Hey! This is an example tour brought to you by the RPI Tours SD&D team!

landmarks.name: RPI Admissions
landmarks.description: This is the admissions building.

landmarks.name: Barton Residence Hall
landmarks.description: Barton was first opened in Fall 2000 and in addition to being our newest residence hall, it also has the distinction of being the campus' only freshman only residence hall.

landmarks.name: Commons Dining Hall
landmarks.description: Situated at the center of the first-year residence halls, the Commons offers several dining stations. These include the popular Asian Pacifica, a savory grill program, pasta prepared to order, a deli and Theme Cuisine.

landmarks.name: Mueller Center
landmarks.description: The Mueller Center is the hub of personal fitness and wellness on the Rensselaer Campus.

landmarks.name: Biotech
landmarks.description: The Center for Biotechnology and Interdisciplinary Studies (CBIS) at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute interweaves life sciences, physical sciences, and engineering into the fields of biotechnology and medicine, opening exciting new pathways to innovation and discovery.
